title: "Play Again" goes to weird version of "Custom Game" #2
body:
02/08/15 : Over the past couple of months, in the after game lobby, when I press "Play again" it takes me to the Custom game list instead of putting me in the queue for the game mode I was just playing. It's also happening to a couple of my friends.


EDIT 29/08/15: Bumping again because STILL no RED activity. This is meant to be help and support? Where's the support? Do your jobs!

Still happening to me after a month of posting the original post. Screen shot attached.
